Text:
Hello Jjakob,
You did a great work! All is perfect, but could You give to all of us deaf people english subtitles :) (for previous releases too)?
It's easy to demux them from source dvd with the help of free soft PGc-demux or dvd_decrypter.
We not fluent in modern english will be thankfull to You forever!
Love the DVD's great job... But ive been trying to download this one for 3 days ... need seeder .. Im stuck at 96%
We need a source with 100%. There must be somebody out there.
